eventSummary: A ZEROBASE front-end hack resulted in over 270 users losing more than $240K USDT. Following the attack, Binance Wallet has blocked malicious domains and contracts.Sources:- https://twitter.com/2207129125/status/1999585206261469443

eventSummary: There are questions about whether Bitcoin has been hijacked.Sources:- https://cryptopanic.com/news/27898676/Has-Bitcoin-Been-Hijacked

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: Hackers compromised the Zerobasezk frontend, stealing over $240K from more than 270 users, including one user who lost 123,597 $USDT. Users are advised to revoke any suspicious contract approvals in their wallets.Sources:- https://cryptopanic.com/news/27897404/Hackers-compromised-the-zerobasezk-frontend-stealing-funds-from-270-users-totaling-over-240K-One-user-alone-lost-123597-USDT-Please-use-or-other-tools-to-revoke-any-suspicious-or-unnecessary-contract-approvals-in-your-wallet-Stay-safe
